long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension together with the website [https://www.wishyou.best/](https://www.wishyou.best/) is helping users to add items to their wishlists with a single click. 

The user should have an account on [https://www.wishyou.best/](https://www.wishyou.best/). 

The user should install the extension. 

The user will have a verification code on his Settings page. This code should be inputted on the extension so the extension and the website can match. 

The user can browse through [https://rozetka.com.ua/,](https://rozetka.com.ua/) [https://www.foxtrot.com.ua/,](https://www.foxtrot.com.ua/) [https://allo.ua/, and](https://allo.ua/) [https://www.citrus.ua/](https://www.citrus.ua/) and add items from the marketplaces to his wishlist in a single click

Demo: https://www.loom.com/share/751655bed1e24cf98dd5c31c20b5fe38
